articles.author: Rebecca Rommen
articles.title: Virginia tech firm fined $7.5K for posting white-only job listing: DOJ - Business Insider
articles.description: Arthur Grand, a Virginia-based tech company, will pay a civil penalty for posting a job ad that excluded all non-whites. It blamed a junior employee.
